channel.title: Congratulations You're Level 99!
channel.description:
Hey Guys.
I'm Using Devolution 7.0 And I Have Been Trying To Get The Server To Additem To Your Inventory When You Reach 99 In A Skill. I Have Tried Many Codes From Many People And None Seem To Work.
Just The Setout Would Be Really Great.
Thanx. :)

item.title: Congratulations You're Level 99!
item.dc:creator: @reeper620 reeper620
item.description:
@reeper620 wrote:

“Congratulations You’re Level 99!”

Am i? Ty.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations You're Level 99!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Already Fixed Sorry I Was Waiting For You To Post So I Didn’t Double Post

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations You're Level 99!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Rich You have been very helpful to me and also i would recommend you edit that last post because of leechers I Cannot thank you enough…If any time you would like to come on my server don’t hesitate.

shad0wscap3.no-ip.org

You rock Man!!

Thanx.

And also bug, you couldn’t have been more helpful.

Thanx Guys :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2008, 03:17:11 AM[/size][hr]Err Um If I Have 1 99 Skill It Will Give All The Skill Capes

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations You're Level 99!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Replace your whole case 155 with mine…

[code] case 155:
// first Click npc
NPCSlot = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
if ((NPCSlot < 0) || (NPCSlot >= server.npcHandler.npcs.length)
|| (server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot] == null))
break;
NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
boolean FishingGo = false;
boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
if (NPCID == 804) {
openTan();
}
if (NPCID == 316) {
/* Net From Net & Bait - Any Sea /
if ((IsItemInBag(303) == true) && (actionTimer == 0)) {
startFishing(316);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a " + getItemName(303)
+ " to fish here.”);
} if (NPCID == 312) {
if ((IsItemInBag(301) == true) && (actionTimer == 0)) {
startFishing(312);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a " + getItemName(301)
+ " to fish here.”);
}
} if (NPCID == 313) {
if ((IsItemInBag(311) == true) && (actionTimer == 0)) {
startFishing(313);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a " + getItemName(311)
+ " to fish here.”);
}
}
} else if (NPCID == 0) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo).replaceAll("", " “), 4884);
sendFrame126(“I see you have a 99 skill, have these skillcapes.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
if(combat >= 126){
addItem(6570,1);
}
if(playerLevel[0] >= 99){
addItem(2678,1);
addItem(2679,1);
}
if(playerLevel[2] >= 99){
addItem(2681,1);
addItem(2682,1);
}
if(playerLevel[1] >= 99){
addItem(2684,1);
addItem(2685,1);
}
if(playerLevel[3] >= 99){
addItem(2702,1);
addItem(2703,1);
}
if(playerLevel[4] >= 99){
addItem(2687,1);
addItem(2688,1);
}
if(playerLevel[5] >= 99){
addItem(2690,1);
addItem(2691,1);
}
if(playerLevel[6] >= 99){
addItem(2693,1);
addItem(2694,1);
}
if(playerLevel[7] >= 99){
addItem(2732,1);
addItem(2733,1);
}
if(playerLevel[8] >= 99){
addItem(2735,1);
addItem(2736,1);
}
if(playerLevel[9] >= 99){
addItem(2717,1);
addItem(2718,1);
}
if(playerLevel[10] >= 99){
addItem(2729,1);
addItem(2730,1);
}
if(playerLevel[11] >= 99){
addItem(2696,1);
addItem(2697,1);
}
if(playerLevel[12] >= 99){
addItem(2714,1);
addItem(2715,1);
}
if(playerLevel[13] >= 99){
addItem(2726,1);
addItem(2727,1);
}
if(playerLevel[14] >= 99){
addItem(2723,1);
addItem(2724,1);
}
if(playerLevel[15] >= 99){
addItem(2708,1);
addItem(2709,1);
}
if(playerLevel[16] >= 99){
addItem(2705,1);
addItem(2706,1);
}
if(playerLevel[17] >= 99){
addItem(2711,1);
addItem(2712,1);
}
if(playerLevel[18] >= 99){
addItem(2720,1);
addItem(2721,1);
}
if(playerLevel[19] >= 99){
addItem(2738,1);
addItem(2739,1);
}
if(playerLevel[20] >= 99){
addItem(2699,1);
addItem(2700,1);
} else {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo).replaceAll(”", " "), 4884);
sendFrame126(“You need a 99 Stat before you can have Skillcapes.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
}
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
} else if ((NPCID == 494) || (NPCID == 495) || (NPCID == 496)
|| (NPCID == 497) || (NPCID == 2354) || (NPCID == 2355)
|| (NPCID == 2619) || (NPCID == 3198)) {
/ Banking /
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 1;
} else if (NPCID == 553) {
/ Aubury */
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 3;
} else if (NPCID == 1597) {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 9;
} else if (NPCID == 398) {
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 398;
sendFrame200(4883, 398);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(398), 4884);
if (premium) {
sendFrame126(“Welcome to the Guild of Legends”, 4885);
} else {
sendFrame126(“You must be a premium member to enter”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Visit Devolution.com to subscribe”, 4886);
}
sendFrame75(398, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
if (premium) {
ReplaceObject(2728, 3349, 2391, 0, 0);
ReplaceObject(2729, 3349, 2392, -2, 0);
}

		} else {
			println_debug("atNPC 1: " + NPCID);
		}
		if (PutNPCCoords == true) {
			skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
			skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
		}
		break;[/code]

item.title: Congratulations You're Level 99!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Or you could just add a Skillcape master, that gives you capes when you get the 99 stat.

Such as:

} else if (NPCID == 0) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("I see you have a 99 skill, have these skillcapes.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); if(combat >= 126){ addItem(6570,1); } if(playerLevel[0] >= 99){ addItem(2678,1); addItem(2679,1); } if(playerLevel[2] >= 99){ addItem(2681,1); addItem(2682,1); } if(playerLevel[1] >= 99){ addItem(2684,1); addItem(2685,1); } if(playerLevel[3] >= 99){ addItem(2702,1); addItem(2703,1); } if(playerLevel[4] >= 99){ addItem(2687,1); addItem(2688,1); } if(playerLevel[5] >= 99){ addItem(2690,1); addItem(2691,1); } if(playerLevel[6] >= 99){ addItem(2693,1); addItem(2694,1); } if(playerLevel[7] >= 99){ addItem(2732,1); addItem(2733,1); } if(playerLevel[8] >= 99){ addItem(2735,1); addItem(2736,1); } if(playerLevel[9] >= 99){ addItem(2717,1); addItem(2718,1); } if(playerLevel[10] >= 99){ addItem(2729,1); addItem(2730,1); } if(playerLevel[11] >= 99){ addItem(2696,1); addItem(2697,1); } if(playerLevel[12] >= 99){ addItem(2714,1); addItem(2715,1); } if(playerLevel[13] >= 99){ addItem(2726,1); addItem(2727,1); } if(playerLevel[14] >= 99){ addItem(2723,1); addItem(2724,1); } if(playerLevel[15] >= 99){ addItem(2708,1); addItem(2709,1); } if(playerLevel[16] >= 99){ addItem(2705,1); addItem(2706,1); } if(playerLevel[17] >= 99){ addItem(2711,1); addItem(2712,1); } if(playerLevel[18] >= 99){ addItem(2720,1); addItem(2721,1); } if(playerLevel[19] >= 99){ addItem(2738,1); addItem(2739,1); } if(playerLevel[20] >= 99){ addItem(2699,1); addItem(2700,1); } else { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("You need a 99 Stat before you can have Skillcapes.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); } sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true;

Change the Item ids if you want, and npcid.
